My team and I are having issues using a mk4c swerve drive and a pigeon 2.0. We recently swapped to using a pigeon because during last week’s competition we experienced major disconnection issues using our navx2 even when providing packup power via usb from the rio. After switching to the pigeon, all seemed great, except once we realized how bad it was drifting. After literally 5 seconds of driving it was at least 3-5 degrees off. No \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eCAN\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Controller Area Network\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e faults, no errors, nothing.
